p: Second, beyond the cell-surface proteins, schistosomes also express a large number of glycans as part of their glycoprotein and glycolipid repertoire, and an antibody response against those glycans is mounted by the infected host [ 80]. In 2 cases, the specific antibodies produced could be identified using B cell cloning [ 81] or after infection of mice genetically modified to express human antibody repertoires [ 82]. Interestingly, there has been no systematic analysis of the antibodies produced that target the various stages of the parasite life cycle, although early work on S. mekongi suggests schistosomula and adult worm extracts would induce a better response [ 83].
